column1: The U.S. State Department has announced a global level 4 travel advisory, directing Americans to cease international travel and for U.S. citizens abroad to either return home or to shelter in place, as the coronavirus spreads across the U.S. A Level 4 advisory warning, the state department’s most severe warning, would elevate the current Level 3 warning put in place last week —which recommends U.S. citizens to rethink their international travel plans— and indicates how seriously government officials are taking the coronavirus pandemic.Earlier reporting indicated that while Secretary Mike Pompeo supported the measure, figures inside the state department worried the directive could cause panic for Americans currently stranded abroad, according to Politico. https:/…6ae7274a6f13Edited: 4:43 pm, March 19, 2020

The State Department is urging Americans not to travel overseas and to return to the United States if they can, a move that comes amid concerns about the coronavirus pandemic. The Level 4 travel advisory warning against all international travel also indicated that citizens who stay abroad should expect no assistance from the US government if they decide to remain abroad and find themselves stranded amid a health crisis.“The Department of State advises U.S. citizens to avoid all international travel due to the global impact of COVID-19. In countries where commercial departure options remain available, U.S. citizens who live in the United States should arrange for immediate return to the United States, unless they are prepared to remain abroad for an indefinite period. U.S. citizens who live abroad should avoid all international travel. Many countries are experiencing COVID-19 outbreaks and implementing travel restrictions and mandatory quarantines, closing borders, and prohibiting non-citizens from entry with little advance notice. Airlines have cancelled many international flights and several cruise operators have suspended operations or cancelled trips. If you choose to travel internationally, your travel plans may be severely disrupted, and you may be forced to remain outside of the United States for an indefinite timeframe.”https:/….XnPHGUBrXPM.twitter
